io.github.robolib.module.iface

Class PWM

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.module.iface.Interface
      • io.github.robolib.module.iface.PWM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LiveWindowSendable, NumberSink, Sendable, UpdatingSendable, Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PWMController, Servo

    public class PWM
extends Interface
implements Module, LiveWindowSendable, NumberSink
    The PWM Interface class.
    Author:
    noriah Reuland

      • setBounds

        public final void setBounds(double max,
                            double deadMax,
                            double center,
                            double deadMin,
                            double min)
        Set the bounds on pulse widths for this PWM.
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum PWM pulse in ms
        deadMax - The maximum of the pulse deadband in ms
        center - The center/zero/off pulse width in ms
        deadMin - the mimium of the pulse deadband in ms
        min - The minimum PWM pulse in ms
